item.title: Josh add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Only dull people are brilliant at breakfast." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Who, being loved, is poor?" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people we personally dislike." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "There is no sin except stupidity." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "There are moments when one has to choose between living one's own life, fully, entirely, completely-or dragging out some false, shallow, degrading existence that the world in its hypocrisy demands." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Hear no evil, speak no evil, and you won't be invited to cocktail parties." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Ordinary riches can be stolen, real riches cannot. In your soul are infinitely precious things that cannot be taken from you." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To be popular one must be a mediocrity." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Life is not complex. We are complex. Life is simple, and the simple thing is the right thing." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "When I think of all the harm [the Bible] has done, I despair of ever writing anything to equal it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I won't tell you that the world matters nothing, or the world's voice, or the voice of society. They matter a good deal. They matter far too much. But there are moments when one has to choose between living one's own life, fully, entirely, completely—or dragging out some false, shallow, degrading existence that the world in its hypocrisy demands. You have that moment now. Choose!" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description:
"My life-my whole life- take it, and do with it what you will. I love you-love you as I have never loved any living thing. From the moment I met you I loved you, loved you blindly, adoringly,madly!
You didn't know it then-you know it now." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The most terrible thing about it is not that it breaks one’s heart—hearts are made to be broken—but that it turns one’s heart to stone." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If you cannot write well, you cannot think well; if you cannot think well, others will do your thinking for you." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Josh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Josh add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Josh add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Josh add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Josh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Josh add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Josh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Josh add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Josh add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams
